comments:
in M3...

I noticed that from time to time when I rename a launch configuration (typically an OSGi config) a config with the new name shows up but the old config name stays in the list in the dialog. if you click on the name you get the error below.  This does not always seem to happen. For example I just renamed two.  The first had the problem, the second did not.
